title.narrative: Growing the demand for FLEGT-licensed timber: Improving communication between users and producers on customer expectations and values of FLEGT processes

description.narrative: Increased awareness and acceptance among furniture and interior design companies in UK and key EU markets of FLEGT-licensed tropical timber; and improved capacity of producers in Indonesia, Ghana and China to respond to UK and EU market demands.

UK and selected EU member states customers’ appreciation of the values embedded in FLEGT licences and underlying national stakeholder deliberations will be improved, and better understanding of how customers and specifiers make purchase decisions will be gained. The capacity of suppliers in Ghana and Indonesia to promote their products more effectively will be enhanced by: helping associations represent their members to participate in FLEGT processes; explaining UK and EU market requirements; and supporting promotion of their members’ products. Chinese exporters’ awareness of market requirements will be improved and relevant trade associations’ capacity to assist members meet requirements will be strengthened.
